pages.text: $(li)The Beach is a small biome composed mostly of Sand and Water.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some aquatic vegetation, like Seagrass and animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seagull)Seagulls$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/lobster)Lobsters$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/crab)Crabs$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l) too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Beach$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
